portfolioItems.title: Yeschef Restaurant Website
portfolioItems.description: Modern restaurant website with online menu and ordering system
portfolioItems.fullDescription: A comprehensive restaurant website built for Yeschef featuring an intuitive online menu, seamless ordering system, and responsive design. The site provides customers with an excellent browsing experience across all devices.

portfolioItems.title: Content Creation Portfolio
portfolioItems.description: Curated content created for various brands - videos, photography, and social media assets
portfolioItems.fullDescription: Explore our collection of brand-focused content creation work including short-form videos, professional photography, and social media assets. Each folder contains curated picks from projects we've delivered to our clients, showcasing our ability to capture brand essence and create engaging visual content.

portfolioItems.title: Business Pitch Deck
portfolioItems.description: Professional investor pitch deck with modern design and clear messaging
portfolioItems.fullDescription: A comprehensive pitch deck designed for a startup seeking investment. Features clean layouts, data visualizations, and compelling storytelling to communicate business value effectively.

portfolioItems.title: Corporate Annual Report
portfolioItems.description: Elegant annual report presentation with infographics and financial data
portfolioItems.fullDescription: A sophisticated annual report presentation designed for a corporate client, featuring custom infographics, financial charts, and a cohesive visual identity that aligns with the company's brand guidelines.

portfolioItems.title: E-Commerce Platform
portfolioItems.description: Full-featured online store with product catalog and payment integration
portfolioItems.fullDescription: A complete e-commerce solution featuring product management, shopping cart, secure payment integration, and admin dashboard. Built with modern web technologies to ensure fast performance and excellent user experience.

portfolioItems.title: Brand Strategy Presentation
portfolioItems.description: Strategic brand positioning deck with market analysis and recommendations
portfolioItems.fullDescription: A comprehensive brand strategy presentation including market research, competitive analysis, brand positioning recommendations, and implementation roadmap. Designed to guide executive decision-making.
